title: Analysis | Video: Every Russia story Trump said was ‘fake news’ or a ‘witch hunt’
subtitle: President Trump continues to insist the Democrats are responsible for any story relating to Russian interference in the 2016 election, despite a year's worth of evidence to the contrary.
